sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Play } from 'lucide-react'; import { useLanguage } from '../context/LanguageContext'; import { TEXT } from '../i18n'; import './GameCards.css'; const GameCards = () => { const { language } = useLanguage(); const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); const [osuStats, setOsuStats] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => setIsVisible(true), 300); // === FRONTEND osu! API FETCH === const OSU_API_KEY = "5f18654c9151ec0bd95f06f25136cf9b0be345d6"; const osuUsername = "NikiOnOsu"; fetch(`https://osu.ppy.sh/api/get_user?k=${OSU_API_KEY}&u=${osuUsername}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { if (data && data.length > 0) setOsuStats(data[0]); else console.error("No osu! data returned"); }) .catch(err => console.error("Failed to fetch osu! stats:", err)); }, []); const valorantData = { rank: 'Gold 1', date: '28/12/2025', mains: 'Duelists, Initiators.', sensitivity: '0.25 @ 800 DPI', clipUrl: 'https://customer-assets.emergentagent.com/job_ohnikx-terminal/artifacts/cfh5k76x_valoclip.mp4' }; const osuData = { clipUrl: 'https://customer-assets.emergentagent.com/job_ohnikx-terminal/artifacts/9bsflu10_1228.mp4', keyboard: 'Attack Shark X65HE', tablet: 'Wacom CTL-4100WL', aimingStyle: 'Drag' }; return (

{TEXT[language].gameStatsTitle}

{/* VALORANT Card */}

VALORANT

{language === 'en' ? 'Current Rank:' : 'Rank Attuale:'} {valorantData.rank}
{language === 'en' ? 'Last Updated:' : 'Ultimo Aggiornamento:'} {valorantData.date}
{language === 'en' ? 'Mains:' : 'Main:'} {valorantData.mains}
{language === 'en' ? 'Sensitivity:' : 'Sensibilità:'} {valorantData.sensitivity}
{/* osu! Card */}

osu!

{osuStats ? ( <>
{language === 'en' ? 'Global Rank:' : 'Rank Globale:'} #{osuStats.pp_rank?.toLocaleString() || 'N/A'}
{language === 'en' ? 'Country Rank:' : 'Rank Nazionale:'} #{osuStats.pp_country_rank?.toLocaleString() || 'N/A'} ({osuStats.country})
PP: {Math.round(osuStats.pp_raw)}pp
{language === 'en' ? 'Accuracy:' : 'Precisione:'} {parseFloat(osuStats.accuracy).toFixed(2)}%
) : (
{language === 'en' ? 'Loading stats...' : 'Caricamento statistiche...'}
)}
{language === 'en' ? 'Keyboard:' : 'Tastiera:'} {osuData.keyboard}
{language === 'en' ? 'Tablet:' : 'Tablet:'} {osuData.tablet}
{language === 'en' ? 'Aiming Style:' : 'Stile di Mira:'} {osuData.aimingStyle}
{/* Other Games Card */}

{language === 'en' ? 'Other Games' : 'Altri Giochi'}

{language === 'en' ? 'mattrx on discord said "not coming soon, cry about it" isn’t tough so i changed it to this' : 'mattrx su discord ha detto "non in arrivo, piangi pure", quindi ho cambiato il testo'}

); }; export default GameCards;
